name: Fruit Dash | Mega Dash |
description:
Fruit Dash

======

Hello everyone! I'm really happy and excited to share this game! It's a horizontal-wall-runner game! I worked a lot on it! And it's my first game in 2022! Enjoy :)

======

~ Instructions ~

    » Move with arrows keys or wasd.

    » Shoot with spacebar

    » Don't touch Lava, spikes or bad apples!

    » Don't lose your lives!

    » Get the highest score

======

~ Credits ~

    » Code and Art: @madrid2030

    » Sound Effects: @KIKOKO_ & @QuaXX

    » Music: Alan Walker and @-Xaf-

    » Bug reported and fixed by: @ThePro255

    » Counter Tutorial: @griffpatch

    » Bug Reported Highscore: @ScratchBlockAnimator

       [Now the bug should be fixed]

======

~ Info ~

This isn't my a remastered game. This is a complete game, which will recive some updates. The current version it's 1.0, and it was updated 7/1/22.

======

Thanks for stopping by!

======
